UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Novel Dermaseptin Isolated from the Skin Secretion of Phyllomedusa tarsius and Its Cationicity-Enhanced Analogue Exhibiting Effective Antimicrobial and Anti-Proliferative Activities.
Literature.Author: Li M, Xi X, Ma C, Chen X, Zhou M, Burrows JF, Chen T, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:IC50=48.80 µM,Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=107 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=4µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=4µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MFC=8µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=8.64µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=18.51µM),Human squamous lung carcinoma NCI-H157(IC50=9.88µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=9.97µM),Human pancreatic carcinoma Panc-1(IC50=11.17µM)
